phrases: Her red color is due to the large amounts of hemoglobin.
She carries oxygen and carbon dioxide using blood circulation.
If you could please sign here...
Well, I hope to serve you again!
Seems like a pretty damn comfortable place!
Not too hot, not too cold.
And looks like there is tons and tons of food!
Starting today, this is our land!
Let us get these annoying residents outta the way!
This is White Blood Cell Neutrophil Division, YOU-1146.
The invading germs have been exterminated.
His main task is to eliminate foreign substances from outside,
Neutrophils comprise over half of the White Blood Cells in the blood.
LET US BID THEM A PLEASANT GOODBYE!
Do not let a single bacterium get away!
Because there will be hell to pay if even one escapes!
It is the White Blood Cells!
S-So they are the White Blood Cells?
Hey, what are you looking at?
I was only doing my job.
I swear I am going to kill them!
Do not think it is over yet!
I am going to deliver this to the lungs fast!
Well, to get to the lungs, I need to make a right here.
What do you think you are doing here?
They are always doing construction around here.
So these maps are hard to figure out!
I do not think I will ever get there...
I wonder if anyone's in here.
There is something I would like to ask you!
Do not act like nothing happened!
Sniffed me out already, you damn White Blood Cell?
No way am I going to let you capture me!
You are that Red Blood Cell from before!
The survivor of the group that just invaded us!
If I do not kill him right away, he will start dividing!
And if that happens, this world will...
The Pneumococci are pathogenic bacteria of the respiratory system
that trigger pneumonia and other diseases,
not to mention highly toxic germs that wield capsules!
I am actually on my way to the lungs myself!
It is not just the lungs that are at risk.
The germ fled into the blood vessels after all!
I mean, we are not untangled at all yet!
Pneumonia's not the only disease that is caused by the Pneumococci.
There is something called pneumococcal bacteremia.
The Pneumococci attack each organ through the blood vessels,
seizing control of the meninges enveloping the brain,
They have been known to invade an entire body in a mere 24 hours.
Th-There is a disease like that?
Since this body's immune system has been compromised.
Normally, it can withstand something like this, but...
Requesting backup to pursue the invading germ.
Try to get by on your own!
Could not they have come up with a better design?
Hey, did you hear that guy say anything?
Also, what was he doing there?
He was looking at a map!
He seemed to be looking for the lungs!
I have got to get there, too!
Even if I am afraid of the Pneumococcus!
Since we are heading toward the same destination.
This is an amazing area we are passing through, huh?
Roadwork is delayed, and we are deeply sorry.
We are still doing some construction up ahead!
But we are in a hurry!
There was some trouble, so construction's been delayed.
And so, you see, the delivery people made a fatal mistake!
- Th-That is adorable... - Th-That is adorable...
Then, we will unload it for you.
Sorry to trouble you when you are busy!
The one who looked like this?
Still, it does not make sense.
the fact that my receptor's been acting up...
Do you think maybe it is broken?
It is not like anything particularly strange is going on.
This is the Helper T Cell.
that a Pneumococcus is on the run within these very blood vessels!
We are mobilizing the Killer T Cells!
Since our most elite Lymphocyte force is on its way,
you have nothing to worry about!
We are ready to put our pride on the line
You have cookie crumbs all over your mouth.
Well, anyway, so there you have it!
In the name of the Killer T Cell Division,
finish the target within two seconds of sighting!
Any moron who let us him escape will be sent to the spleen!
They are pretty pompous, are not they?
They are actually related to us, White Blood Cells.
What is that Red Blood Cell doing here?
She is the one who saw the Pneumococcus.
For someone about to get killed.
No, I would not say nonchalant.
She probably just does not know.
Then here is your chance to learn something!
Pneumococci are alpha-hemolytic cells that crave nutrients.
you Red Blood Cells, who transport nutrients, will become their target!
So better watch your back, all right?
They just want to scare you.
We are out of time, so let us get going.
I do not see anyone making a commotion.
You think maybe we overtook him?
All right, time to say goodbye.
Thank you for showing me the way!
Thank you so much for your hard work!
All right, what do I do now?
Now that I cannot use my receptor...
Smoke him out, no matter what!
We will continue our pursuit of the fleeing bacterium.
Where the hell did he go?
THIS IS THE LEFT LUNG ALVEOLUS 50th-120th FLOOR ELEVATOR RIGHT LUNG
I am supposed to pass through the capillaries to get to an alveolus.
Are you getting your job done?
All right, in these situations, look here.
You will find the same numbers on every door.
I see you are the same as ever.
You just need to learn step by step.
The capillary is cramped, so please enter one at a time.
Be courteous and only one at a time, huh?
I wonder where that Pneumococcus went.
I just hope I do not run into him.
For transporting me all this way!
To not even realize what it was you were delivering!
Now that I am here in the alveolus,
it is the best place to lie in wait for Red Blood Cells transporting nutrients!
I think I will take the edge off my appetite!
You sure are delivering a ton of nutrients!
Since I just stopped by the small intestine.
You think you just protected your friends?
Talk about an exercise in futility!
And right before you are about to be massacred no less!
Go ahead and call out for help, for all I care!
Not that anyone will be able to come to rescue
if you block the way like that!
He is going to kill me!
I can see you have not done your homework.
We, White Blood Cells, are transmigrating cells.
Meaning we can slip through blood vessel walls to reach our enemies!
How did you know I was here?
The instant that Red Blood Cell left me,
my receptor stopped responding, you see!
I never would have thought you would be hiding inside the package!
No way am I going to let myself be killed after I have come this far!
he says he is going to attack any Red Blood Cell carrying nutrients!
I am going to obliterate you!
It is not like the one he used as a smokescreen!
It is a more powerful screen he can use to directly shield himself!
I have no chance against something that powerful in close combat!
You should not let him know that!
Before I launch my all-out invasion, I am going to torture you guys to death!
Why did you tell him that, of all things?
White Blood Cell, forget about idiots like me and run!
Maybe I will go for that.
What is wrong, White Blood Cell?
Red Blood Cell, step back a little further.
After you massacred all my buddies!
I am going to see to it
that you share the same fate!
We have succeeded in capturing the bacterium.
We will now remove the bacterium.
DRINK CORNER ALL YOU CAN DRINK
You cannot destroy that capsule from the inside, no matter what.
And this is inside the bronchial tubes.
Do you know what that means?
Wh-What the hell's up with that?
Are not you ashamed, using tactics like this?
Do not look away from me!
I know you can hear me!
Can I get you something to drink, too?
Okay, I will have what you are having.
Come watch with me over here.
LEAVE IT TO YOUR HELPER T CELLS!
CALL THE WBC IN TIMES OF TROUBLE ELIMINATING PARASITES EOSINOPHILS
Since I have to get back to work.
I mean, there are so many of us White Blood Cells.
there are even more of us Red Blood Cells!
Well, since we both work in the same world,
we will run into each other someday.
All right, then, please take it easy!
Is not it peaceful, White Blood Cell?
Next episode of Cells at Work!, Scrape Wound.
